inclusion.criterion: Histological severity of chronic hepatitis C will be done using the modified histological activity index (HAI) scoring system by Ishak for grading and staging
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: chronic viral hepatitis and that for steatosis and steatohepatitis will be done using the scoring system that is currently being used in the NIH-funded Virahep-C study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Hepatitis C patients who underwent previous therapy for their liver disease
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has Hep C cirrhosis, grade II esophageal varices, and recent admission for UGIB. Patient also describes new imbalance leading to a fall during which he may have hit his head on.
